name: GammaPon
description: GammaPon go around the maze and collect all of the axes and then collect the hammer and you then have 10 hammers you can throw at the zombies with the space bar last as long as you can and get the highest score possible using all 3 lives use the arrow keys to move. Just download and unzip and open you don't have to install run and play and enjoy. Don't worry there is no install and it has been tested safe no viruses.
